Welcome to Rest API’s documentation!¶

REST API main¶

class main.UserModel(*, email: str, password: str)¶

Bases: BaseModel

Model representing a user.

email: str¶
password: str¶
async main.confirmed_email(token: str, db_session: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Confirm a user’s email address.

Parameters: - token (str): The email verification token. - db_session (Session): The database session.

Returns: - dict: A message indicating whether the email is confirmed.

async main.create_contact(contact: ContactCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Create a new contact for the current user.

Parameters: - contact (ContactCreate): The contact data. - current_user (User): The authenticated user. - db (Session): The database session.

Returns: - Contact: The created contact.

async main.delete_contact(contact_id: int, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Delete a specific contact for the current user.

Parameters: - contact_id (int): The ID of the contact. - current_user (User): The authenticated user. - db (Session): The database session.

Returns: - dict: A message indicating the successful deletion of the contact.

async main.get_contact(contact_id: int, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Get a specific contact for the current user.

Parameters: - contact_id (int): The ID of the contact. - current_user (User): The authenticated user. - db (Session): The database session.

Returns: - Contact: The requested contact.

async main.get_contacts(current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Get all contacts for the current user.

Parameters: - current_user (User): The authenticated user. - db (Session): The database session.

Returns: - dict: The list of contacts.

async main.login(body: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(OAuth2PasswordRequestForm), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Authenticate a user and generate access and refresh tokens.

Parameters: - body (OAuth2PasswordRequestForm): The login form data including username (email) and password. - db (Session): The database session.

Returns: - dict: The access and refresh tokens.

async main.read_item(current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Example protected route.

Parameters: - current_user (User): The authenticated user.

Returns: - dict: A secret message.

async main.refresh_token(credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Security(HTTPBearer), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Refresh the access token using a valid refresh token.

Parameters: - credentials (HTTPAuthorizationCredentials): The bearer token credentials. - db (Session): The database session.

Returns: - dict: The new access and refresh tokens.

async main.root()¶

Root endpoint.

Returns: - dict: A greeting message.

async main.signup(body: UserModel, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks, request: Request, db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Register a new user.

Parameters: - body (UserModel): The user data including email and password. - background_tasks (BackgroundTasks): Background tasks to execute. - request (Request): The incoming request. - db (Session): The database session.

Returns: - dict: The newly created user information.

async main.startup()¶

Event handler for application startup.

async main.update_avatar(user_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), avatar: UploadFile = File(Ellipsis))¶

Update the avatar for a user.

Parameters: - user_id (int): The ID of the user. - db (Session): The database session. - avatar (UploadFile): The updated avatar file.

Returns: - dict: The updated avatar URL.

async main.update_contact(contact_id: int, contact: ContactUpdate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Update a specific contact for the current user.

Parameters: - contact_id (int): The ID of the contact. - contact (ContactUpdate): The updated contact data. - current_user (User): The authenticated user. - db (Session): The database session.

Returns: - Contact: The updated contact.

async main.upload_avatar(user_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), avatar: UploadFile = File(Ellipsis))¶

Upload an avatar for a user.

Parameters: - user_id (int): The ID of the user. - db (Session): The database session. - avatar (UploadFile): The uploaded avatar file.

Returns: - dict: The avatar URL.

REST API service Auth¶

class services.auth.Auth¶

Bases: object

Class for authentication and JWT token handling.

ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRE_MINUTES = 30¶
ALGORITHM = 'HS256'¶
SECRET_KEY = 'secret_key'¶
async create_access_token(data: dict, expires_delta: float | None = None)¶

Create a new access token.

Parameters:

  • data (dict) – The data to encode into the token.

  • expires_delta (float) – Optional expiration time in seconds.

Returns:

The encoded access token.

Return type:

str

create_email_token(data: dict)¶

Create a token for email verification.

Parameters:

data (dict) – The data to encode into the token.

Returns:

The encoded email verification token.

Return type:

str

async create_refresh_token(data: dict, expires_delta: float | None = None)¶

Create a new refresh token.

Parameters:

  • data (dict) – The data to encode into the token.

  • expires_delta (float) – Optional expiration time in seconds.

Returns:

The encoded refresh token.

Return type:

str

async get_current_user(token: str = Depends(OAuth2PasswordBearer), db: Session = Depends(get_db))¶

Get the current authenticated user.

Parameters:

  • token (str) – The JWT token.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

The current authenticated user.

Return type:

User

Raises:

HTTPException – If the credentials are invalid or the user does not exist.

async get_email_from_email_token(email_token: str)¶

Get the email from an email verification token.

Parameters:

email_token (str) – The email verification token.

Returns:

The email associated with the email verification token.

Return type:

str

Raises:

HTTPException – If the token is invalid.

async get_email_from_refresh_token(refresh_token: str)¶

Get the email from a refresh token.

Parameters:

refresh_token (str) – The refresh token.

Returns:

The email associated with the refresh token.

Return type:

str

Raises:

HTTPException – If the refresh token is invalid.

async get_email_from_token(token: str)¶

Get the email from a token.

Parameters:

token (str) – The token.

Returns:

The email associated with the token.

Return type:

str

Raises:

HTTPException – If the token is invalid.

oauth2_scheme = <fastapi.security.oauth2.OAuth2PasswordBearer object>¶
class services.auth.Hash¶

Bases: object

Class for password hashing and verification.

get_password_hash(password: str)¶

Get the hashed password for the given plain password.

Parameters:

password (str) – The plain text password.

Returns:

The hashed password.

Return type:

str

pwd_context = <CryptContext>¶
verify_password(plain_password, hashed_password)¶

Verify if the plain password matches the hashed password.

Parameters:

  • plain_password (str) – The plain text password.

  • hashed_password (str) – The hashed password.

Returns:

True if the passwords match, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

REST API service Email¶

async services.email.send_email(email: EmailStr, username: str, host: str)¶

Send an email to the given email address.

Parameters:

  • email (EmailStr) – The email address to send the email to.

  • username (str) – The username.

  • host (str) – The host URL.
